description:
Head out to repeat a favourite hike or grab your HALO rig for a training jump. This watch will keep you in the know. Blacked out design, rugged nylon strap and night-vison-friendly backlight suit the Core Alpha Stealth to a particular user. Sunrise/sunset times for 400 locations around the world. The altimeter tracks your ascent and descent rates, and logs them for review. Once you’re at rest, the barometer mode automatically kicks in, so the Storm Alarm can warn you of sudden, severe pressure drops. Need to navigate a retreat? Use the compass mode to sight, lock a bearing, and go.

  • Mineral crystal glass and a readable dot-matrix display
  • Red LED backlight won’t mess with your night vision
  • Operating range of -20 to 60°C to altitudes of -500m to 9000m
  • Selectable metric or imperial units
  • Altimeter reads real-time vertical as a cumulative value, and total ascent and descent
  • User-removable log graphs and logbook files
  • Automatic altimeter/barometer switch and a seven-day memory
  • Resolution is 1m with recording intervals of 1, 5, 30, and 60 seconds
  • Barometer indicates sea level pressure, weather memory for seven days, trend indicator, and graph
  • Barometer resolution is 0.05 inHg/1 mbar with a range of 8.9 -32,4 inHg/300-1100 mbar
  • Storm alarm to indicate sudden changes in air pressure
  • Depth meter tracks dives to 10 metres
  • Compass uses guided calibration, heading in cardinal or half-cardinal points, declination setting, and bearing tracking
  • Water-resistant to 30m
  • User replaceable battery
name: Suunto Core Alpha Stealth
